Text: This file happens to be a self extracting rar archive, in case you don't use windows.  I used unrar on it without problems.  There are over 700 roms in this collection, apparently all US releases (This means no Japanese roms, translated or otherwise).  Thanks for making this great collection! :)

Just downloaded and extracted (manually)
Upon extracting, 2 errors occured..
So 2 of the games in this entire package might not work, but no other errors indicated. 

Nice work.
